p: Territory of Washington} Action? for The V.S.} of

Record of Conviction This is to certify that Mary Ann ONeil was convicted of the crime of Vagrancy on the 9th day of November 1886. as being an Habitual Drunkard and in default of Bonds in the sum of 50.00 Dollars for her good behavior was committed to the County Jail for 30 days or until said Bond is filed and legally dischaged from custody.
Given under my hand this 9th day of November 1886
